intro: Jordaaniella cuprea, commonly known as the copperleaf, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its striking copper-colored leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-white flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun.
